title: Targus Kaleidoscope Optical Retractable Mouse AMU83US
description: The Targus Mini Kaleidoscope Retractable Mouse is a fun and functional optical mouse. When powered, the mouse radiates seven continuous colors to brighten up your workspace. Colors are visible through the translucent scroll wheel and also show through the side and bottom of the mouse. Customizable color settings allow the user select one of seven colors or cycle through all of the colors during use. The optical technology provides accurate and precise mouse movements while the scroll wheel makes it easy to navigate through web pages and spreadsheets. The USB cable retracts creating a small form factor for travel and allows users to adjust the cable length. The ergonomic design is both comfortable and ambidextrous making it easy to use whether you are left or right handed. Product Features and Specifications: Functionality - Continuously rotates through 7 colors, or select your color style and change it at any time, Design - Compact design and adjustable USB cord make this space-saving mouse ideal for travel and kids, Adjustable Cable - USB cord changes to desired length; retracting cord provides great travel convenience, RoHS Compliant **Please be advised that new Targus product should arrive in sealed retail packaging as shown in the image gallery.
